personal_info.summary: Business - Inventor - EntrepreneurMedia and Entertainment. Specialization: Software Development Corporate Finance Industrial Development Ideas to revolutionize the digital world, Gold, Diamonds, High level Commodity Experience, Real Estate Market, Investment Funds Management,Banking instruments. Gustavo Dias is a strong and optimistic person, develops great opportunities for the market, I love the people involved in my business as if they were family. I seek to build good relationships and systems for the market, executing with knowledge and strategies.I love working in a team where we can develop self-confidence, enthusiasm, work with proactivity and synergy. I am a curious person and always seek a solution, I am here to help and to add values, managing with ethics, respect and trust, working for a better world.Teamwork is richer, stronger and therefore able to reach the most difficult goals, working as a team is to unite different ways of thinking for a single goal.The satisfaction of a work team is the result of good decisions made by their leader. Reciprocity is something wonderful, knowledge is power, hunger is essential and humility is king.When we select our clients, we will analyze employee turnover, market share, whether new or old. What technology they are using, and where we are going to design them to be 5 to 10 years from their beautiful background.We do not want a big company in the market, we do not want all the customers at the same time. Training and customer service is what we must provide and the delivery value of each product. Stable growth, so that we leave a mark in the market execultando with knowledge, strategies.
